name: Feature Implementation
description: Scope to MVP, plan, implement, adversarially test, validate performance, and verify a new feature end-to-end

scope-review.description: MVP scoping gate — evaluate requirements for size, break down if too large, define the bounded increment and acceptance criteria before any planning begins

planning.description: Architecture planning and task breakdown — plan against the scoped increment, not the full original request

implementation.description: Code generation and implementation — implement only the scoped increment

red-team-assessment.description: Adversarial post-implementation review — attack the code, hunt edge cases, probe failure modes

performance-validation.description: Performance validation — profile the implementation, benchmark critical paths, verify no regressions

done.description: Increment complete — note deferred increments for the next session
